nodes.text: The toothspike raptor was a creature native to the planet Colla IV. The bell-shaped hull of the Droch-class boarding ships produced by the Colicoid Creation Nest were loosely based on toothspike raptors.

Toothspike raptors were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. Toothspike raptors were original created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned in the 2008 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars: The Visual Guide, written by Jason Fry and Heather Scott.
